## Configuration translation ## CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_active=Active CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_active_0=no CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_active_1=yes CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_type=Type CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_type_bar=bar CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_type_box=box CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_position=Position CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_position_top=top CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_position_bottom=bottom CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_animation=Animation CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_animation_none=none CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_animation_slide=slide CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_animation_fade=fade CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_backgroundColor=Background color CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_foregroundColor=Foreground color CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_opacity=Opacity CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_buttonText=Button text CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_configButtonText=Configuration Button Text CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_disclaimer1=Disclaimer 1 CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_disclaimer2=Disclaimer 2 CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_necessaryInfoBox=Necessary Info Box CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_preferencesInfoBox=Preferences Info Box CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_statisticsInfoBox=Statistics Info Box CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_marketingInfoBox=Marketing Info Box CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_preferencesScripts=Preferences Scripts CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_statisticsScripts=Statistics Scripts CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_marketingScripts=Marketing Scripts CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_necessaryLabel=Modify the "necessary" label CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_preferencesLabel=Modify the "preference" label CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_statisticsLabel=Modify the "statistics" label CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_marketingLabel=Modify the "marketing" label
## Disclaimer ## cookieConsent.configure.title.mandatory=Necessary cookieConsent.configure.title.preferences=Preferences cookieConsent.configure.title.statistics=Statistics cookieConsent.configure.title.marketing=Marketing cookieConsent.crtUser.hasAccepted=Current user accepted cookies
## Administration ## cookieConsent.administration.heading=GDPR Cookie Consent Setup cookieConsent.administration.description.intro=This extension allows to setup a GDPR compatible consent screen for cookies and trackers. This will allow you to ask for your user's consent to activate or not the usage of cookies or trackers depending on different types of tools: cookieConsent.administration.description.necessary=necessary: necessary cookies which are mandatory and cannot be disabled cookieConsent.administration.description.preferences=preferences: preferences cookies or trackers which are optional and enabled by default but used only to remember your preferences cookieConsent.administration.description.statistics=statistics: statistics related cookies or trackers which are optional and enabled by default and user to record anonymous statistics cookieConsent.administration.description.marketing=marketing: marketing or other related cookies or trackers which are optional and disabled by default and can record personal information cookieConsent.administration.heading.general=General cookieConsent.administration.heading.configurableText=Configurable Text cookieConsent.administration.heading.trackers=Trackers and scripts cookieConsent.administration.heading.labels=Customize labels
